item.description:
Borderland State Park
Date: 03/27/2010
Time: 10am-12pm
Meet location: Visitors Center at Borderland State Park

I'll be on my mountain bike.

Entrance for the Visitors Center is approximately 282 Massapoag Avenue, Easton, MA.
More details: http://www.mass.gov/d...

Parking lot at the park is $2 or requires a season pass. Never really checked the actual town position regards on-street parking to be able to say officially.

Plan is for a continuous ride at a moderate pace on bike trails with possible excursions on the packed dirt carriage trails for warmup, warmdown, and to connect trails.

Figure on regrouping at path junctions if riders' abilities differ.

Ride is participatory in nature. Riders who have experience with one area or trail(s) will be able to contribute in decision making.

Expect riders will have helmets and other safety equipment they need.
item.name: Borderland State Park
